title: (x) Bronx Zoo headline face - Erbar Cond {Lex}
content:
I saw this narrow, slightly distressed font on a [Bronx Zoo](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015617/http:/www.bronxzoo.com/) poster; quite nice. What is it?

 [‹ (x) HGTV Titling typeface - Locator {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015617/http:/typophile.com/node/12833 "Go to previous forum topic") [Maxim Comic Book Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015617/http:/typophile.com/node/12823 "Go to next forum topic")
author: William Berkson

comments.content:
It appears to be based on [Erbar Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015617/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.107943.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=NEW+YORK+ZOOS+AND+AQUARIUM&sampleSize=48) but is heavier and eroded.

- Lex

Thanks, that does look like the source. But they also bolded it, roughened it, and put a bit of flare like Albertus on it.

I guess it was a custom job.
